title: Utsunomiko: Heaven Chapter
synopsis: Delving into the humans' spiritual journey to the Celestial Realm of Buddha, UTSU NO MIKO follows five friends on their quest to bring peace to a corrupt and chaotic Earth.
staff: [['Fujikawa, Keisuke', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Original Creator']], ['Fukuda, Michio', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director']], ['Takegami, Junki', ['Series Composition']], ['Itabashi, Katsumi', ['Mechanical Design']]]
